original_text: There was also another great eagle. It had strong wings and many feathers. Now the vine turned its roots and its branches towards this eagle. It wanted to get more water in the ground where it was growing.
korean_text: 또 날개가 크고 털이 많은 큰 독수리 하나가 있었는데 그 포도나무가 이 독수리에게 물을 받으려고 그 심어진 두둑에서 그를 향하여 뿌리가 뻗고 가지가 퍼졌도다

sentences.original_text: There was also another great eagle.
It had strong wings and many feathers.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 강한 날개와 많은 깃털을 가졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: Now the vine turned its roots
and its branches towards this eagle.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 가지를 이 독수리를 향했습니다.

sentences.original_text: It wanted to get more water
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 더 많은 물을 얻고 싶었습니다.

sentences.original_text: in the ground where it was growing.
